age.description: Age-related variables, including date of birth and age in years.

gender.description: Gender-related variables, including assigned sex and self-reported gender identity.

livingsit.description: Living situation, including upbringing, province, city, family structure, and housing.

ethnicity.description: Ethnicity and country of origin, covering multiple generations and self-reported ethnic background.

health.description: Health-related variables, including current and past diagnoses, treatments, and medications.

ses.description: Socioeconomic status (SES), including financial situation, cultural capital, and subjective social status.

romrelation.description: Romantic relationships, including past and current relationship status.
